name: Cheerat
description:
Please do not use names that are longer than 8 characters, otherwise we will have to delete your result, so the leaderboard doesn't get messed up!

Controls
  • A/D to move left or right.
  • Hold A/D and then press Space to jump.
Important!
  • Yellow cheese = 10 points.
  • Purple cheese = 25 points.
  • Blue cheese = 50 point.
  • Green/white cheese = -10 points.
  • Red cheese = -50 points.
